Each satellite weighs approximately 45.4 kg (100 ibs) and is solar powered. No batteries are provided. The transponder of the DSCS Phase I satellite is a double frequency conver足 sion, hard-limiting repeater operating in the 7-to 8-GHz range. The EIRP has a design minimum of 7 dBW. Each satellite had a beacon signature at its uiique telemetry frequency, in the 400-MHz area, for identification purposes.
